com.maingame.game.states

Class PlayState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maingame.game.states.State
      • com.maingame.game.states.PlayState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DemoPlayState

    public class PlayState
extends State
    Handles the logic of the main game and loading of assets.

    • Method Detail

      • handleInput

        public void handleInput()
        Handles user input within a state. Gives the player an initial speed and makes the camera follow the player. Given a user input, handles acceleration and movement of player on the screen. Also handles player fatigue.
        Specified by:
        handleInput in class State

      • handleInputLogic

        public void handleInputLogic()

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Updates other functions/values in a state. Sets a 3 second countdown after which the game starts.
        Specified by:
        update in class State
        Parameters:
        dt - the time between each start of a render()

      • boatsOutOfBounds

        protected void boatsOutOfBounds()
        Checks if for each boat it is out of its lane including the player boat.
        See Also:
        Boat.isBoatOutOfLane()

      • updateMapColour

        protected void updateMapColour()
        Changes the colours of bars depending on the percentage left in each bar.

      • repositionObstacles

        protected void repositionObstacles()
        Repositions Obstacles once they are off the screen. The obstacles are repositioned randomly to have a y value higher the top edge of the screen.
        See Also:
        Obstacle.moveObstacle()

      • updateCollisionBoundaries

        protected void updateCollisionBoundaries()
        Updates the collisionBoundaries for the boats and the obstacles. This is done to match the current position of a boat/obstacle.
        See Also:
        Obstacle.updateCollisionBounds()

      • collisionDetection

        protected void collisionDetection()
        Detects collisions by calling checkHit for each obstacle and boat combination.
        See Also:
        Obstacle.checkHit(Boat)

      • updateBoatPenalties

        public void updateBoatPenalties()
        Adds a time penalty to each boat including the player boat when the penaltyBar is empty.

      • checkBoatHealth

        public void checkBoatHealth()
        Checks if the boat has depleted its health and changes hasLost
        See Also:
        Boat.setHasLost(boolean)

      • finishLeg

        public void finishLeg()
        checks if the leg is over and transitions to the leaderboard state.
